warning: This file is intentionally left blank.
message: To enable Firebase services, download your own google-services.json file from Firebase Console and place it in the app directory.
instructions: 2. Select your project or create a new one.
3. Navigate to 'Project Settings' (gear icon in Firebase Console).
4. In the 'General' tab, scroll down to 'Your apps' section.
5. Download the google-services.json file for your Android app.
6. Place the downloaded file in the 'app/' directory of this project.
